name.ja: <ruby>次<rt>じ</rt></ruby><ruby>元<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>同<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>異<rt>い</rt></ruby><ruby>体<rt>たい</rt></ruby>ヴァリス

text.en: Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster with the same Type or Attribute. You can declare 1 Type and 1 Attribute; this card becomes that Type and Attribute, until the end of your opponent's turn. You can only use this effect of "Dimensional Isoallotope Varis" once per turn.
